metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13872

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP4

metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the HDF HDF5 1.8.20 library. There is a heap-based buffer overflow in the function H5G_ent_decode in H5Gent.c.
